Text:
The amount of epicness presented trough your crack's main menu is imposible to descrive in mear text. 

Sir when i heard the chirping birds i tought to my self "No, this cannot be, no one could be as epic as to put Pink Floyd on their crack". But then as the chirping progressed i heard jet engines and i felt as if i had been reborn into a creature capable only of orgasmic feelings. 

Thanks for the crack too.
